verse:
अन्यत्र धर्मादन्यत्राधर्मादन्यत्रास्मात्कृताकृतात्‌। 
अन्यत्र भूताच्च भव्याच्च यत्तत्पश्यसि तद्वद ॥

terms.कृताकृतात्: from what is done and what is not done

meaning: Meaning:In other words, what is right and what is wrong varies in different circumstances. Similarly, what is done and what is not done also varies. You should observe and understand that what has happened in the past and what will happen in the future differs in different situations. Accordingly, you should speak.

upanishad-org.meaning: Tell me of That which thou seest otherwhere than in virtue and otherwhere than in unrighteousness, otherwhere than in this created and this uncreated, otherwhere than in that which has been and that which shall be.
